entity.name: The White House
entity.description: Conversation from and about the White House, both as a destination and as political voice

text:
@kylegriffin1 Trump Feb 26th 2020
In front of a packed White House briefing room, President Trump told the country there were only 15 cases of coronavirus in the US, and “within a couple days [it is] going to be down to close to zero”

Today    1,789,218  cases    
         104,403   deaths
